text: Muminasakalara ōcarata nabī haichē tē'ōm̐lōkara nijatakaiẏō bēchi ghaniṣṭa, ārau tē'ōm̐ra straīsakala tē'ōm̐lōkara mātr̥. Āllāhara bidhāna anuyāẏī mumina ārau muhājirasakalatakai ātmīẏa-sbajanasakala parasparaē bēchi ōcarata. Kintu tōmālōkē tōmālōkara bandhu-bāndharara prati kalyāṇamūlaka kibā karaiba bicārailē sēẏā sūkīẏā kathā. Ēẏā kitābata lipibad'dha āchē
